title: Transfer Talk podcast discuss Liverpool's Virgil van Dijk deal and Alexis Sanchez's Arsenal future
description: The second episode of Transfer Talk is available to download now!
content: Host Pete Graves was joined in the studio by Sky Sports News reporters Dharmesh Sheth and Aidan Magee to discuss all the latest goings on in the world of transfers.The panel chat about Liverpool's record-breaking Â£75m signing of defender Virgil van Dijk, the possible knock-on effects that deal could have on the market and the three players Southampton are targeting following their massive cash windfall.Click here to listen to the Transfer Talk podcast.They also delve into the future of Alexis Sanchez and discuss whether Manchester City could make their move for the Arsenal forward this month.Leading Belgian football journalist Kristof Terreur joined the show to speak about the futures of Belgian quartet Thibaut Courtois, Eden Hazard, Marouane Fellaini and Toby Alderweireld.Click here to listen and subscribe via iTunes.Sky Sports News reporter Kaveh Solhekol provides an update on the future of Moussa Dembele and reveals the clubs chasing the Celtic forward.If all that was not enough, former West Brom and Stoke forward Peter Odemwingie also joined the podcast to recount the infamous collapse of his move to Queens Park Rangers on Deadline Day in 2013.
